title: cant get lol to launch into log in screen.
body: i open the client click launch but it doesn't launch into the log in screen, this is the first time I've encountered this and i need help thanks.

replies.body: Your patching might be having an issue with corrupted files, which could cause a failure in launching properly.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you still run into any issues afterwards!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Vo3FoNyo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-20T17:04:37.298+0000)
>
> Your patching might be having an issue with corrupted files, which could cause a failure in launching properly.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide to get this resolved.  Let me know if you still run into any issues afterwards!



after downloading the hextech repair tool i messed around with it, then ran league as admin but nothing changed still cannot get to the log in screen.
